code: import{rest}from'msw';import types from'./data/types.json';import animals from'./data/animals.json';import details from'./data/details.json';export var handlers=[rest.get('/types',function(_req,res,ctx){return res(ctx.status(200),ctx.json(types));}),rest.get('/animals',function(req,res,ctx){var type=req.url.searchParams.get('type');var query=req.url.searchParams.get('query');var response=animals.animals;if(type!==''){response=response.filter(function(animal){return animal.type.toLowerCase()===type.toLowerCase();});}if(query!==''){response=response.filter(function(animal){return animal.contact.address.state.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||animal.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase());});}return res(ctx.status(200),ctx.json(response));}),rest.get('/animals/:id',function(req,res,ctx){var id=req.params.id;var response=details[id];if(!response){return res(ctx.status(404));}return res(ctx.status(200),ctx.json(response));})];
